label: Graphite
tag line: Decentralized and encrypted alternative to Google's G-Suite
Description1: Graphite is a productivity suite offering document editing and creation, spreadsheets, file storage, contact management, and messaging.
Description2: Graphite is for the creators. The businesses. The people. It's for everyone who wants more security, privacy, and censorship resistance. Whether you are looking to move away from Google because of a moral stance or you need protection from snooping to protect yourself, Graphite is for you.
Community Info: Because of the focus on privacy and security, there is very little we know about Graphite's users. We know they come from all over the world, and we know there are approximately 20,000 users since March of 2018.
description:
#Decentralized and encrypted alternative to Google's G-Suite
##About Graphite
![About Graphite]()
 ###Graphite is a productivity suite offering document editing and creation, spreadsheets, file storage, contact management, and messaging. 
Graphite is for the creators. The businesses. The people. It's for everyone who wants more security, privacy, and censorship resistance. Whether you are looking to move away from Google because of a moral stance or you need protection from snooping to protect yourself, Graphite is for you.
